text: Bradley or Brad Jones may refer to: ==Sports== * Brad Jones (racing driver) (born 1960), Australian racing driver * Brad Jones (ice hockey) (born 1965), American former professional ice hockey left winger * Brad Jones (soccer) (born 1982), Australian footballer * Brad Jones (American football) (born 1986), American football linebacker ==Other== * Brad Jones (bassist) (born 1963), American jazz bassist * Brad Jones (musician), pop singer * Bradley Jones Jr. (born 1965), minority leader of the Massachusetts House of Representatives * Bradley Jones (snooker player) (born 1974), English former snooker player * The Cinema Snob, alter ego of internet humorist and film critic Brad Jones (born 1981)
title: Bradley Jones
